loan.name: Jose Claudio
loan.use: to buy organic fertilizer and pay for labor to weed the coffee plantation.
loan.description: Jose is 33 years old and resides in the small population center Tamborapa Pueblo-Tabaconas. For the past 15 years, Jose has been involved in cultivating organic coffee, which he sells to a local cooperative. Additionally, he earns income from raising and selling small animals. Jose will use the loan to buy organic fertilizer and pay for labor to weed his coffee plantation.
loan.whySpecial: It supports lucrative and sustainable livelihoods for organic farmers.
loan.partnerName: Cooperativa de Ahorro y Cr√©dito Norandino
